author: Vivek Narayanan
text:
Celebration by All India Anna Dravida Munntera Kazhagam (AIADMK) cadre following a party meeting went awry when an airborne cracker misfired, injuring one person and damaging a car and window panes at an apartment complex on Ponniamman Kovil Street at Kotturpuram on Saturday evening

State Minister for Social Welfare B. Valarmathi had taken part in the meet. The apartments are situated 100 feet away from the venue.

According to the police, the injured, identified as Jaya Kumar (40), a resident of Kannan Garden, was taking bath at his ground floor apartment when the explosion damaged the window panes and shards of glass pierced his neck and ear. Jaya Kumar is undergoing treatment at a private hospital in Nandanam.

Residents, on condition of anonymity, said that the cadre had been bursting crackers all evening. A resident added that the sparks from another cracker had fallen close to her son.
title: Cracker blast at AIADMK meeting injures resident
